whitebalancemodes: Automatic scene recognition; Custom / Colour temperature selection (K); Preset : Fine, Shade, Fluorescent light (Daylight), Fluorescent light (Warm White), Fluorescent light (Cool White), Incandescent light, Underwater, Custom, Colour temperature selection
flashmodes: Red-eye removal OFF: Auto / Forced Flash / Suppressed Flash / Slow Synchro.; Red-eye removal ON: Red-eye Reduction Auto / Red-eye Reduction & Forced Flash / Suppressed Flash / Red-eye Reduction & Slow Synchro.  (* Red-eye removal is active when Face Detection is set to ON.)
exposuremodes: Programmed AE / Aperture Priority AE / Shutter Speed Priority AE / Manual exposure
focusrange: Normal: Wide : Approx. 50cm / 1.6 ft. to infinity, Telephoto : Approx. 80cm / 2.6 ft. to infinity; Macro: Wide : Approx. 3cm - 3.0m / 1.1 in. - 9.8 ft., Telephoto : Approx. 50cm - 3.0m / 1.6 ft. - 9.8 ft.
